## Tuning Parameters

```{r spark-param-info, echo = FALSE}
defaults <- 
  tibble::tibble(parsnip = c("penalty", "mixture"),
                 default = c("0.0", "0.0"))

param <-
  linear_reg() %>% 
  set_engine("spark") %>% 
  make_parameter_list(defaults)
```

This model has `r nrow(param)` tuning parameters:

```{r spark-param-list, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
param$item
```

For `penalty`, the amount of regularization includes both the L1 penalty (i.e., lasso) and the L2 penalty (i.e., ridge or weight decay). As for `mixture`:

* `mixture = 1` specifies a pure lasso model,
* `mixture = 0`  specifies a ridge regression model, and
* `0 < mixture < 1` specifies an elastic net model, interpolating lasso and ridge.

## Translation from parsnip to the original package

```{r spark-csl}
linear_reg(penalty = double(1), mixture = double(1)) %>% 
  set_engine("spark") %>% 
  translate()
```
